short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable focus mode on Chrome's official Extensions and Chrome Web Store documentation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The focus mode extension makes you read chrome documentations without any interruption on the page.

Focusing only on what really matters.
